definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: The dreamer and pragmatist battle over fantasy versus reality.
sentences.chinese: 梦想者和实用主义者为幻想与现实问题而斗争不已。

sentences.english: Because of this, Rorty claims reserve Pragmatism and give up Empiricism.
sentences.chinese: 所以罗蒂主张保留实用主义而把经验主义加以剔除。

sentences.english: He does not lose his integrity simply in virtue of his commitment to utilitarianism .
sentences.chinese: 他没有失去他的正直心仅仅因为他对实用主义的承诺。

sentences.english: China is following a pragmatic policy of only allowing one child per couple.
sentences.chinese: 中国的一胎症策是基于实用主义的。

sentences.english: Nationals of the United States not to the absolute individualism and pragmatism.
sentences.chinese: 不要将美国国民性中的实用主义和个人主义绝对化。

sentences.english: The functionalists tend to be economists and those concerned with the U.S.-China economic relationship.
sentences.chinese: 实用主义者多是经济学家和关注美中经济关系的人。

sentences.english: Another reason Ilike business is that it is realistic.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢商业的另一个原因是它的实用主义。

sentences.english: I'm a, philosophically I'm a pragmatist.
sentences.chinese: 从哲学上来讲，我是个实用主义者。

sentences.english: Pragmatists , who are much less tolerant, make up the large majority of the market.
sentences.chinese: 但容忍性较差的实用主义者占据了市场的大部分。

sentences.english: The pragmatic lesson concerns those wars of religion.
sentences.chinese: 实用主义的教训关乎宗教的战争。

sentences.english: We need to muster the same pragmatism to save humanity.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要召集同样的实用主义去拯救全人类。

sentences.english: As much as idealism there really is a pragmatism to Earthships.
sentences.chinese: “关于“地球”的实用主义和理想主义一样多。

sentences.english: It was a very interesting combination of streetwise pragmatism and philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 这是种有趣的街头实用主义与哲学的组合。

sentences.english: The functionalist model of industrial society was subjected to conceptual criticism .
sentences.chinese: 工业社会的实用主义模型在概念上遭到了批判。

sentences.english: The key to understanding Asian approaches is their pragmatism.
sentences.chinese: 理解亚洲方式的关键是它们的实用主义。

sentences.english: This week his optimistic pragmatism was tested in a chilly, autumnal Moscow.
sentences.chinese: 本周，他乐观实用主义在秋寒料峭的莫斯科接受检验。
